name: location
description: Set and see your friends location

options.name: show
options.description: Show the location of a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the location for, default you

options.name: set
options.description: Register your location publicly for other users to see

options.name: location
options.description: The location where you are (use a nearby city, region or state)

options.name: time
options.description: Show the current time for a given user based on their location

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the time for, default you

options.name: weather
options.description: Get current weather for a user's location. Icons by Dr. Lex.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to show the weather for, or your own

options.name: location
options.description: The location to show the weather for, instead of a user's location
